column3: Central location the rooms were studio style ideal for cooking quick dinners as we are travelling to a budget this spas ideal. Staff very friendly and helpful.
Excellent location, friendly staff, brilliant facilities (complimentary tea and coffee) and very clean
The location of the hotel was great, next to the metro station with many restaurants and bar around. The bed was also very good.
column4: The room was very hot and there was no air-conditioning. There was an extra price for the cleanup.

column3: Friendly staff, comfortable rooms and the location is just fine!
Fantastic location near the center. Very appreciate kitchen with fridge.
column4: Noisy nights, impossible to sleep with opened windows. Pillows were awful (like a rubber), contribute to neck/back pain.
Some basic such as salt pepper and oil should be part of kitchen
